briefdescription.para: the general state from the MN (the OBC). It is initialized to 0 so a general state CSV file with EG = 0x0000 should not exist.
the board state of this CN (this CAC board). It is initialized to the copy of the general state EG.
the mode of the program. It is initialized to the automatic mode, the general state CSV files are first used.
the number of values coming out of each CNs
the number of values coming into each CNs
the first value position coming out of this CN (the position of EC)
the first value position coming into this CN (the position of EG)
the LAN card mac address
Pointer to GsOff flag (determines that OpenPOWERLINK stack is down)
the TPDO process variable (coming out of the CN)
the RPDO process variable (coming into the CN)
array of incoming values from the MN
array of values coming out of the CN
array of value activation coming out of the CN true if activated, false otherwise
function to display in the console the values coming from the MN
function to display in the console the values coming from the MN
function to display in the console the values coming out of the CN
function getter of the value coming from the MN from line according to the structure PI_IN

parameterdescription.para: the line according to the structure PI_IN

simplesect.para: int16_t the value coming from the MN

briefdescription.para: function setter of the values coming out of the CN namely, the valves and sensors values.
function getter of the value coming out of the CN from line according to the structure PI_OUT

parameterdescription.para: the line according to the structure PI_OUT

simplesect.para: int16_t the value coming out of the CN

briefdescription.para: function setter to fill the activation array from the CSV activation file "activation.csv"
function getter of the current general state (EG)
function to check if the general state (EG) has been changed

simplesect.para: statusErrDef infoModeSetToManual if the mode to manual order has been received from the MN or infoEGNotChanged if the EG is still the same.

briefdescription.para: function setter of the board state (EC)
function to initialize the CN OpenPOWERLINK module

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOPLSystemInit when OpenPOWERLINK fails to set the correct configuration for the current operating system. or errSelNetInterface when the selection of the network interface fails when in a Windows machine. Can be caused by the absence of WinPcap. or errInitObjDictionary when the object dictionary header file (objdict.h) has incorrect values or syntax. or errOplkInit when The OpenPOWERLINK stack fails to initialize, main cause: the stack is not found by the application, check the CN .lib files or errOplkCreate when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails to create a new instance or errOplkAllocProcessImage when the allocation of the input and/or output structure fails because parts of the structure doesn't exist in the objdict.h file or errLinkPDOout when an output object (TPDO) doesn't exist for the same reasons above or errLinkPDOin when an input object (RPDO) doesn't exist for the same reasons above or errSendNMTResetCommand when the OpenPOWERLINK reset command fails or noError when the function exits successfully.

memberdef.argsstring: (UINT32 cycleLen_p, const char *devName_p, const UINT8 *macAddr_p, UINT32 nodeId_p)
memberdef.name: initPowerlink

briefdescription.para: Initialize the openPOWERLINK stack.

detaileddescription.para: The function initializes the openPOWERLINK stack.

parameterdescription.para: MAC address to use for POWERLINK interface.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errSelNetInterface when the selection of the network interface fails when in a Windows machine can be caused by the absence of WinPcap. or errInitObjDictionary when the object dictionary header file (objdict.h) has incorrect values or syntax. or errOplkInit when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails maybe because the stack is not found by the application, check the CN .lib files. or errOplkCreate when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails to create a new instance or noError when the function exits successfully.

listitem.para: It creates the sync thread which is responsible for the synchronous data application.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errSendNMTResetCommand when the OpenPOWERLINK reset command fails or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to check if the OpenPOWERLINK stack crashed or a termination signal has been received from the OS app manager.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errSystemSendTerminate if a termination signal has been received or errOplKernelStackDown if the OpenPOWERLINK stack crashed or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Synchronous data handler.

detaileddescription.para: The function implements the synchronous data handler. the valve dependance verification and the sensor reading is called here to trigger valves for every CAC boards (every CNs) at the same time.

simplesect.para: The function returns a tOplkError error code.

briefdescription.para: Setup inputs.

detaileddescription.para: The function initializes the digital input port.

briefdescription.para: Initialize process image.

detaileddescription.para: The function initializes the process image of the application.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkAllocProcessImage when the allocation of the input and/or output structure doesn't exist in the objdict.h file or errLinkPDOout when an output object (TPDO) doesn't exist for the same reasons above. or errLinkPDOin when an input object (RPDO) doesn't exist for the same reasons above. or noError when the function exits successfully.

memberdef.argsstring: (tObdSize obdSize, UINT16 arrayIndex, UINT16 index, UINT8 subIndex)
memberdef.name: linkPDO_in

briefdescription.para: function to link a CN RPDO (recieved process data object) gotten from the mnobd.cdc binary file generated by OpenCONFIGURATOR to the OpenPOWERLINK application.

parameterdescription.para: the size of the PDO in bytes
the index of the CN RPDO array
the index of the CN RPDO in the OpenPOWERLINK object library gotten from this file: 00000000_POWERLINK_CiA401_CN.xdd
the sub index of the specific object to be linked gotten from this file: 00000000_POWERLINK_CiA401_CN.xdd

simplesect.para: The function returns a tOplkError error code.

memberdef.argsstring: (tObdSize obdSize, UINT16 arrayIndex, UINT16 index, UINT8 subIndex)
memberdef.name: linkPDO_out

briefdescription.para: function to link a CN TPDO (transmitted process data object) gotten from the mnobd.cdc binary file generated by OpenCONFIGURATOR to the OpenPOWERLINK application.

parameterdescription.para: the size of the PDO in bytes
the index of the CN TPDO array
the index of the CN RPDO in the OpenPOWERLINK object library gotten from this file: 00000000_POWERLINK_CiA401_CN.xdd
the sub index of the specific object to be linked gotten from this file: 00000000_POWERLINK_CiA401_CN.xdd

simplesect.para: The function returns a tOplkError error code.

briefdescription.para: function to shutdown the OpenPOWERLINK module.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkFreeProcessImage when the freeing of memory of the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails. or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Shutdown the synchronous data application.

detaileddescription.para: The function shuts down the synchronous data application

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkFreeProcessImage when the freeing of memory of the OpenPOWERLINK fails. or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Shutdown the demo application.

detaileddescription.para: The function shuts down the demo application.

briefdescription.para: Module to communicate with the master board using OpenPOWERLINK.

detaileddescription.para:
Mael Parot
1.2
11/04/2024
Contains all functions related to communicating with the master board using OpenPOWERLINK, transfer sensors, valves values and recieve orders from the master.
